name: raunchiness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being connected with sex in a clear and obvious way: This is a new kind of raunchiness in advertising directed exclusively at women. She was not allowed to watch the adult cartoon because of the bad language and raunchiness. See
raunchy
More examplesFewer examplesEach generation has complained about the raunchiness of the music videos that kids are exposed to.The show combines a bit of raunchiness with humour.It was the raunchiness of her work that got her a wide readership.His jokes might have offended the audience because of their sheer raunchiness.Everyone is so focused on the raunchiness that they forget it is, in fact, a love story.
